name: XmasQuest
summary: STORY On Christmas night, a clown who knows the king's secret escapes. A clown chase order is given to Alice and her friends who have not recovered their memories at the royal palace. Ghost town... A deserted town that is not popular. There is a library where ghosts live. It has become a ghost due to the earthquake and a large amount of gas being washed away. Old RPGs can be converted to VR as soon as they are created in this format.
